name: SustainShip üå±
description: Web interface promoting an eco-friendly delivery option which groups packages together on common user-preferred delivery dates to combat the effects of fast shipping and reduce carbon emissions

name: SafeLane üöò
description: Web interface intended to map out the safest and most efficient routes for beginner drivers or drivers with children in the car using an algorithm that avoids routes with high collision frequency intersections and streets
